text:
1. Step forward with the left foot.
2. Pivot on the left foot, turning to the right.
3. Bring the right foot forward and across the left foot.
4. Pivot on the right foot, turning to the left.
5. Step back with the left foot.
6. Pivot on the left foot, turning to the right.
7. Bring the right foot back and across the left foot.
8. Pivot on the right foot, turning to the left.
9. Repeat the above steps in a continuous spinning motion.
